title: Introduction
body:
Adapt allows you to combine text and graphic components on the scrolling page to create rich and varied learning experiences. In addition, a wide range of interactive components are also available to help encourage deeper engagement with the material.

These presentation components can be structured in any way to help you create learning experiences that meet the needs of your learners.
instruction: Scroll down to see what presentation components are available as part of the Version 2.0 core bundle.

_cells.text: Adapt allows you to combine text and graphic components to create rich and varied learning experiences.
The narrative component lets you scroll through a series of images each with some accompanying text.
The text component can often be the best choice for imparting information, particularly when used in conjunction with complementary graphics.
You can add interactivity to an image by using the hot graphic.
